description: Protesters have begun targeting the buses of <PLAYERCOMPANY>, whose presence has contributed to escalating rent and increasing financial troubles for residents of <PLAYERHQ>.
name: Bus Protests

description: some internet vigilantes with nothing better to do have started DDoSing some of our services...
name: DDoS Attack

description: Those internet vigilantes broke into our network and leaked a bunch of emails. We look like assholes. What should we do?
name: Emails Leaked

description: A factory in Shenzhen, which handles production for many major hardware companies, including <PLAYERCOMPANY>, is the subject of much controversy after a worker committed suicide during work hours. One worker commented: "We must work long hours and very quickly. If we get injured, we cannot stop until our shift is over."
name: Factory Suicides

description: ah shit - workers at several of our overseas locations have been organizing and sabotaging equipment. it's killing our productivity. if you take care of it, our productivity will return to normal. otherwise, it won't.
name: Labor sabotage

description: a learn-to-code initiative is asking us to sponsor one of their classes. this could be a good opportunity to create more skilled workers for our company. they're looking for $5,000 -- what do you think?
name: Learn-to-code sponsorship opportunity

description: Hey - look, we're paying our employees a lot here and this competitive hiring is getting a little pricey. What do you say we just agree to ease up? Future hires will be cheaper. It'll be win-win for all of us.
name: No-hire agreement

description: We've detected some intruders trying to steal our trade secrets.
name: North Korean Hackers

description: Shit - our user database has been hacked! User information and passwords were stolen, and our developers were storing them in plaintext!
name: Passwords Hacked

description: Shit - our user database has been hacked. User information and passwords were stolen, but luckily they were salted and encrypted.

description: We have obtained exclusive documents from an anonymous whistleblower detailing a massive government surveillance initiative led by the NSA. A number of companies were complicit, including <AICOMPANY> and <PLAYERCOMPANY>, providing the NSA unfettered access to users' private information.

description: You've denied our request for data access, but we are legally allowed to force compliance. All your data are belong to us.
name: The NSA insists
